description: Variation of condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission  19/5318/FUL dated 29/11/2019 for `Demolition of existing external staircase and single storey building at the rear. Erection of two storey rear extension to provide additional floorspace at ground floor level for the existing public house at No.168 and the restaurant at No.166. Installation of roof lights on the top of the flat roof of the proposed two storey rear extension. Conversion of the former function room of the public house at No. 168, and 2-bedroom flat at first floor level at No. 166, to provide 4 no. new self-contained flats at first floor level at both No. 166 and No. 168. Provision of refuse storage and storage for 4 cycles.' Variation to include alterations to proposed plans for the reposition of front door entrances
